ProductInfo.Features:
iSmart 4CH CCTV H.264 Security DVR 4 Outdoor Nightvision Cameras System 500GB HDD
Plug & Play feature requires only ID and Password to set up.
Live view or Playback recorded video via Smartphones, Tablets, PC and Mac.
Includes 4 High-Resolution Weatherproof Cameras with 420 TV Lines of Resolution.
Infrared LED for night time view up to 60 feet in total darkness. 500GB Hard Drive records up to 1month (based on 15fps, 10 hours/day& D1 recording)
4 channel 1U standalone DVR
Support up to 4 cameras with D1 realtime preview
VGA / TV/Spot(BNC) synchronous video output
All channel simultaneous realtime playback, GRID interface & smart search
Support SATA HDDs , 2 USB2.0
Built-in web server, CMS(DSS/PSS) & DMSS
ProductInfo.Name: iSmart 4CH H.264 DVR Kit with 4 night vision outdoor weatherproof Cameras and preinstalled 500GB HDD
